basic.description: A review of the tectonic origin and filling of various types of sedimentary basins, followed by an examination of the diagenesis of siliciclastic, carbonate and organic sediments, and the implications for the occurrence of hydrocarbons and mineral deposits. PREREQUISITE: GEOL 238* or equivalent; GEOL 365* or equivalent
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Basin Analysis and Economic Deposits
